markets.title: Will Dome (YC startup) succeed before 2027?
markets.resolution_criteria: YES if achieves by 2026: $5M+ funding, OR $1M+ revenue, OR 1,000+ active developers, OR partnership with Polymarket/Kalshi
markets.my_notes: Interesting meta-market: a prediction market about a prediction market infrastructure company. The 41% seems reasonable given the tight timeline and multiple success paths.

markets.title: Will Polyoptions volume hit $100 million in 2026?
markets.resolution_criteria: YES if >= $100M total 2026 trading volume (notional). Data from polyoptions.com by Jan 31, 2027. M&A preventing disaggregation = NO.
key_factors: Currently on testnet, no live trading yet
Options provide leverage/hedging not available in base prediction markets
markets.my_notes: 54% seems slightly high for a platform that hasn't launched yet. But the bull case (options on top of Polymarket's volume) is compelling. Would watch for launch announcements and early volume data.

markets.title: Will the Russia-Ukraine war end before the end of 2026?
markets.resolution_criteria: YES if formal peace agreement/armistice signed before end 2026 AND fighting stops with no major flare-ups (>100 deaths). Must last until later of: end 2026 or 1 month after signing. Temporary broken ceasefires don't count.
key_factors: Strict resolution criteria (formal agreement + lasting peace)
Note: 'identical market trading much higher' elsewhere - possible resolution criteria arbitrage
60 traders suggests moderate liquidity for Manifold
markets.my_notes: The comment about identical markets trading higher is interesting - suggests possible mispricing based on resolution criteria interpretation. Worth investigating cross-platform price differences. 41% feels roughly calibrated for formal peace by end of 2026.

metadata.notes: Initial data collection. Using Manifold markets as learning ground.
